text: Richie Rich"Richie Rich (Harvey comic book). Page 1". Comicvine.com Retrieved in August 31, 2016. "The Richie Rich/Scooby-Doo Show, Vol. One". Amazon.com Retrieved in August 31, 2016."Richie Rich Feature Film DVD (1994)". Amazon.com Retrieved in August 31, 2016. is a fictional character created by Alfred Harvey and Warren Kremer, and published by Harvey Comics in the 1950s. Richie Rich is called the poor little rich boy, or also the richest kid in the world. He appeared in comic book titles such as Richie Rich Millions (1961) and Richie Rich Dollars & Cents (1963). == References == == Other websites == * Richie Rich at the Internet Movie Database Category:Comics characters
title: Richie Rich (comics)
